name: Tim B.
message:
Fantastic idea – thank you so much! There is one question that’s been bothering me for several minutes now: why wouldn’t you reverse the #if compiler condition from RELEASE that doesn’t exist to the DEBUG that does exist by default?
..oh, the Log in with Google fails to return control to your page in Safari after authentication popup disappears on macOS (Catalina), so I had to install Chrome in order to post. Just a feedback.
